segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s actually kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on her task, even though the water is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and it reminds me of my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s funny how determined he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, and it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole scene is just a funny moment in a family’s day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out, but the woman doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids will get away with the cookies or if the woman will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is just a normal, messy moment in a family’s life.
segments.speaker: PAR
